nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Welcome to my shop! I have all sorts of supplies for adventurers. What can I do for you?

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Take your time! Feel free to look around. I'll be here if you need anything.

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Hello there, young adventurer! You look like you've been through a tough battle. Would you like me to heal your party?

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: There you go! All patched up and ready for adventure. Stay safe out there!

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Alright! Come back anytime you need healing. I'm always here to help.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Hey there! Welcome to Sunlit Village. Need any tips for your adventure?

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: When you encounter a monster, you can Attack, use Abilities that cost MP, use Items from your inventory, or try to Flee. Some abilities are super effective against certain elements!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Walk into the tall grass outside the village center. Wild monsters appear as you explore! The further from the village, the tougher they get.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Press ESC to open your menu. You can manage your inventory and equip weapons, armor, helmets, and accessories. Better equipment means stronger stats!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Good luck out there, adventurer! Come back if you ever need more tips.

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: Hello there! I'm the village's monster breeder. I can help you breed your monsters to create new friends with special traits!

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: When two monsters breed, their baby can inherit traits from both parents. Monsters in the same breeding group are more compatible. You can also use special items like Breeding Charms and Trait Crystals to improve your chances!

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: Sometimes, if you're lucky, a baby monster will develop a rare mutation! These special traits are very powerful. Using a Mutation Catalyst item can increase your chances of getting one.

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: Come back anytime you want to breed your monsters. Good luck on your adventure!
